markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vestigial Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=2536) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ganzi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=339" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 96 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You possess small, weak wings that aid in balance. You gain the [Steady Balance](/Feats.aspx?ID=845) and [Cat Fall](/Feats.aspx?ID=765) skill feats as bonus feats, even if you aren't trained in Acrobatics.
name: Vestigial Wings
